title: China and Korea Clash Over Pandas and Pickled Vegetables
sub_head: Internet users get heated over symbols of national pride for the two nations
body:
As Chinaâ€™s global technological and economic heft grows, the U.S. and other advanced nations have become increasingly concerned over its efforts to set the technical standards for emerging technologies like 5G.
Also, pickled vegetables.
